unnormalised: ## Ditch the CDs, Embrace the Stream: My Two Rupees on Music Streaming!
normalised: ## Ditch the C D s, Embrace the Stream: My Two Rupees on Music Streaming!

unnormalised: Hey folks! Remember back in the day, meticulously arranging your CD collection? Or burning mixtapes for your crush (ahem, Priya from Chembur)? Those were the days, alright. But honestly, who has time for that now? Enter: music streaming!
normalised: Hey folks! Remember back in the day, meticulously arranging your C D collection? Or burning mixtapes for your crush (ahem, Priya from Chembur)? Those were the days, alright. But honestly, who has time for that now? Enter: music streaming!

unnormalised: These days, I’m all about that streaming life. Forget lugging around a bulky discman on the local train to CST. With just my phone and an internet connection, I have access to practically every Bollywood banger, classic rock anthem, and even Carnatic music raga under the sun. Think of it as a massive, constantly updating digital jukebox in your pocket.
normalised: These days, I’m all about that streaming life. Forget lugging around a bulky discman on the local train to C S T. With just my phone and an internet connection, I have access to practically every Bollywood banger, classic rock anthem, and even Carnatic music raga under the sun. Think of it as a massive, constantly updating digital jukebox in your pocket.

unnormalised: I mean, who doesn't love humming along to a Pritam song while stuck in Bangalore traffic? Or discovering a new independent artist from Kerala that your friend Karthik recommended? That’s the magic of streaming services like Spotify, Apple Music, and JioSaavn. They're basically your personal music gurus, always ready with a suggestion based on your listening habits.
normalised: I mean, who doesn't love humming along to a Pritam song while stuck in Bangalore traffic? Or discovering a new independent artist from Kerala that your friend Karthik recommended? That’s the magic of streaming services like Spotify, Apple Music, and JioSaavn. They're basically your personal music gurus, always ready with a suggestion based on your listening habits.

unnormalised: And let's be real, the sheer convenience is unbeatable. Making a playlist for your Diwali party? Done in minutes. Need some chill tunes for a Sunday evening chai session at Marine Drive? Sorted. Plus, no more worrying about scratched CDs or losing your favorite Lata Mangeshkar album.
normalised: And let's be real, the sheer convenience is unbeatable. Making a playlist for your Diwali party? Done in minutes. Need some chill tunes for a Sunday evening chai session at Marine Drive? Sorted. Plus, no more worrying about scratched C D s or losing your favorite Lata Mangeshkar album.

unnormalised: The cost? Well, usually a monthly subscription that’s probably less than that fancy vada pav you had last week (worth it, though!). Many offer free trials, so you can test the waters before committing. Just make sure you have a decent internet plan, because that data can disappear faster than sweets at a Mithaiwala shop during a festival.
normalised: The cost? Well, usually a monthly subscription that’s probably less than that fancy vada pav you had last week (worth it, though!). Many offer free trials, so you can test the waters before committing. Just make sure you have a decent internet plan, because that data can disappear faster than sweets at a Mithaiwala shop during a festival.

unnormalised: Recently, I was revisiting the music from "Dil Chahta Hai" on a streaming platform – such a classic! And it reminded me of my college days at IIT Bombay, when we'd blast that soundtrack during late-night study sessions. Nostalgia level: 100%!
normalised: Recently, I was revisiting the music from "Dil Chahta Hai" on a streaming platform – such a classic! And it reminded me of my college days at I I T Bombay, when we'd blast that soundtrack during late-night study sessions. Nostalgia level: one hundred percent!

unnormalised: So, are you still clinging to your dusty old CDs? It’s time to join the streaming revolution! Trust me, your ears (and your storage space) will thank you. Happy listening, everyone! And don’t forget to tell me your favorite streaming discoveries in the comments below!
normalised: So, are you still clinging to your dusty old C D s? It’s time to join the streaming revolution! Trust me, your ears (and your storage space) will thank you. Happy listening, everyone! And don’t forget to tell me your favorite streaming discoveries in the comments below!
